alert_updateShortcuts: Run Shortcut Widget will now generate a cached list of shortcuts that you can search via a case-insensitive search. If you have a lot of shortcuts installed on your iOS device, this process may take several seconds.
alert_welcome: Run any shortcut from the Notification Widget, even when NoteCuts is running in the background.
alert_welcome_3: By default, you will speak the name of the shortcut that you want to run. There are some magic commands to adjust settings.
alert_welcome_4: If you are using NoteCuts, you’ll need to set up a local NoteCut that shortcuts will be sent to.
prompt_notecut: Select a local NoteCut that will be used to launch shortcuts.
prompt_runMode: How would you like shortcuts to run from this widget?
prompt_shortcut_filter: Filter shortcuts with a case-insensitive search.
prompt_sort: Choose sort order when displaying shortcuts.
